t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - Brand name discrepancies: Ensure that the brand name you provide during enrollment matches the trademark text exactly. Pay attention to spaces and symbols to prevent discrepancies. For example, if you register your trademark as “Buy with Prime” but your application shows “BuywithPrime,” it will not get approved. Capitalization differences are accepted. Image guidelines...
